XXbhikavau:509: tatra tad ahar upasaṃpannayā yatra tad ahar upasaṃpannayā tatra varṣaśatopasaṃpannayā iti yā tu samānaśīlatā samānaśikṣatā samānaprātimokṣasūtroddeśatā sā te
XXbhikavau:511: adyāgreṇa te evaṃnāmike upādhyāyikāyā antike mātṛsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā upādhyāyikayā api tavāntike duhitṛsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā adyāgreṇa te upādhyāyikā yāvajjīvaṃ glānā upasthāpayitavyā .ānād vā upādhyāyikayā tvaṃ glānā upasthāpayitavyā /
